channel.title: python-PIL on Poney Island
channel.description: Recent content in python-PIL on Poney Island

item.title: picoCTF 2018 - Forensics
item.description: forensics-warmup-001 We download a zipfile with the command curl -Ok url. The -k switch allows to by-pass ssl certificates checking when downloading a file in TLS (with https). we first check the zipfile with the command file: it’s indeed effectively a zip so we can unzip and explore the content. Apparently there is an image, we open it with eog and we can observe the flag curl -Ok https://<URL>/flag.zip file flag.
